label: Ph.D. in Information Engineering
description: My thesis, titled "Interactive Visualization of Semantic Web Data", presents a method, based on the use of cartographic principles and space-filling curves, for visually representing and exploring Linked Data sets as they were traditional geographic maps.

label: Master Degree in Computer Science
description: My thesis, titled "Spacetime: A Two Dimensions Search and Visualisation Engine Based on Linked Data", proposes a tool for searching specific entities coming from DBpedia and visualizing it in a spatio-temporal way.

label: Bachelor Degree in Computer Science
description: I worked on a thesis focused on pedestrian dynamics, a research area studying pedestrian behaviours. The thesis describes a comparative development of virtual simulations performed using different software. The specific case of a bridge in the area of Porta Genova in Milan has been developed during the crowdy event of the Salone del Mobile.
